short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to bookmark links with Dry.ai

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A tool to quickly bookmark links with Dry.ai. Use this utility when you're on a webpage you want to save on your Dry.ai site. Simply click the extension icon and you'll be redirect to Dry.ai where your link is bookmarked and saved.
